ingredients: 1  banana, 1 cup frozen strawberries, 1 cup frozen blueberries, 1 cup frozen cherries, 4  ice cubes,   +   1/2 cup orange juice,   +   3/4 cup vanilla yogurt,   +   1/2 teaspoon honey (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 1g 3%, Cholesterol 2mg 1%, Sodium 34mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 23g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 43mg 214%, Calcium 101mg 8%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 420mg 9%
